projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app that i made which uses a public api from openweathermap.com. Displays the current weather and a 3 day forecast. Made with vanilla JS and CSS

projects.name: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.description: A two player game of Tic Tac Toe. Made with JavaScript and Css

projects.name: Twitter Clone
projects.description: This is a clone of twitter where users can create tweets. The app uses Firebase as a back end and has user authentication built into it so users can create and account. I made this with React for the frontend and used firebase for the backend.

projects.name: Crypto Site
projects.description: This website fetches the marketprices of different cryptocurrencies on the different exchanges. This site uses a large amount of different Apis to fetch the correct data. Made with React and Bootstrap

projects.name: Pomadoro App
projects.description: I made this app to help me study. It works as both a To Do list and a pomadoro app.
